00026 // lbann_callback_summary .hpp .cpp - Callback hooks to summarize to Tensorboard
00028 
00029 #include "lbann/callbacks/lbann_callback_summary.hpp"
00030 
00031 namespace lbann {
00032 
00033 lbann_callback_summary::lbann_callback_summary(lbann_summary* _summarizer,
00034                                                int _batch_interval) :
00035   lbann_callback(_batch_interval, _summarizer) {
00036   
00037 }
00038 
00039 void lbann_callback_summary::on_batch_end(model* m) {
00040   m->summarize(*summarizer);
00041   // Note that these comm stats are a running sum, so they count from the last
00042   // time we reset and thus are over the whole batch_interval period.
00043   // Bytes sent/received are the sum of the bytes sent/received by every rank
00044   // in a model.
00045   lbann_comm* comm = m->get_comm();
00046   size_t bytes_sent = comm->get_bytes_sent();
00047   size_t bytes_received = comm->get_bytes_received();
00048   size_t model_barriers = comm->get_num_model_barriers();
00049   size_t intermodel_barriers = comm->get_num_intermodel_barriers();
00050   size_t global_barriers = comm->get_num_global_barriers();
00051   comm->reset_stats_counters();
00052   summarizer->sum_reduce_scalar("bytes_sent", bytes_sent, m->get_cur_step());
00053   summarizer->sum_reduce_scalar("bytes_received", bytes_received,
00054                                 m->get_cur_step());
00055   summarizer->reduce_scalar("model_barriers", model_barriers,
00056                             m->get_cur_step());
00057   summarizer->reduce_scalar("intermodel_barriers", intermodel_barriers,
00058                             m->get_cur_step());
00059   summarizer->reduce_scalar("global_barriers", global_barriers,
00060                             m->get_cur_step());
00061 }
00062 
00063 void lbann_callback_summary::on_epoch_end(model* m) {
00064   lbann_comm* comm = m->get_comm();
00065   summarizer->reduce_scalar("train_accuracy", m->get_train_accuracy(),
00066                             m->get_cur_step());
00067   summarizer->flush();
00068 }
00069 
00070 void lbann_callback_summary::on_test_end(model* m) {
00071   lbann_comm* comm = m->get_comm();
00072   summarizer->reduce_scalar("test_accuracy", m->get_test_accuracy(),
00073                             m->get_cur_step());
00074   // Reset counters incremented during test phase.
00075   comm->reset_stats_counters();
00076   for (auto&& layer : m->get_layers()) {
00077     layer->reset_counters();
00078   }
00079 }
00080 
00081 }  // namespace lbann
